amendatorysection.para: The Director of Correctional Services with the consent of the Board of Parole shall appoint a Parole Administrator, who shall be a person with appropriate experience in the field of corrections, or with training in relevant disciplines at a recognized university.

annotation.para: Sentencing judge's announcement he considered possible effect of statutes permitting prison authorities to ameliorate sentences did not violate constitutional due process, and sentences were not excessive. State v. Houston, 196 Neb. 724, 246 N.W.2d 63 (1976).
